Articles.Content:
I have quite a lot of vehicles in flight and I like all the different mapview icons for probes, capsules, stations, bases, rovers and so on.

But since SSTOs become quite popular and often used, 

I would like to suggest to add an new SSTO icon to those categories.

It's not a big deal but I find the capsule symbol a bit unsatisfying for SSTOs and I also would like to quickly distinguish between those two different types in mapview or the tracking station.

I for one still use capsules for longer spacetrips and SSTOs mainly for Kerbins SOI.
Also need a plane icon along with ssto (Id like a boat myself)
I agree. Also spaceplane icon. The capsule icon could be redesigned to something more CSM-ish looking.
I agree, however, this is in fact on the WNTS list. Mainly because there's not too much meaningful discussion we can have around it. Though if you prove me wrong...
